websites.name: County Commission
websites.description: Through the Alachua County website, you can send a public records request to the county, learn about each commissioner and what districts they represent, learn the district boundaries, and find the meeting videos and agendas.

websites.name: School Board
websites.description: Through the school board site you can find the current superintendent, the board members and the districts finances.

websites.name: Sheriff's Office
websites.description: Through the Sheriff's website, you can submit public records requests, find contact numbers for agencies and sign-up for a ride-along.

websites.name: Property Appraiser
websites.description: Run property searches through the Alachua County Property Appraiser site.

websites.name: Clerk of Court
websites.description: The Clerk of Court Site will help to find information about a case. The site will also tell you if a person is in jail.

websites.name: Tax Collector
websites.description: This is the Alachua County Tax Collector site.

websites.name: Jail
websites.description: Find the name, age, sex, race, pod and booking date of an inmate.

websites.name: Levy County Commission
websites.description: Through the Levy County website, you can send a public records request to the county, learn about each commissioner and what districts they represent, learn the district boundaries, and find the meeting videos and agendas.

websites.name: Levy School Board

websites.name: Levy Sheriff's Office
websites.description: Through the Sheriff's website, you can submit public records requests, find contact numbers for agencies and sign-up for a ride-along.

websites.name: Levy Property Appraiser
websites.description: Run property searches through the County Property Appraiser site.

websites.name: Levy Clerk of Court
websites.description: The Clerk of Court Site will help to find information about a case. The site will also tell you if a person is in jail.
